snippet: Shares of Infosys fell 13 percent on Friday in New York.
abstract: Infosys, India’s second-largest software services exporter, forecasts sales that miss analysts’ estimates, setting off a 13 percent decline in its share price.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Infosys fell 13 percent on Friday in New York.

headline.main: Software Service in India Tumbles After Forecast
headline.print_headline: Software Service In India Tumbles After Forecast
